title: "The Meaning Of Christmas" By Jon Allen Bonus Episode!!
description:
Weirdos! Just in time for the holidays, Jon Allen has blessed us with another tale straight from his brilliant mind. "The Meaning of Christmas" is a 90s throwback thriller with an ending that will blow your pants apart. Trust us, it's exactly what we need.

This episode is ad free and will be in addition to the regular two episodes this week! We just wanted to give you an extra gift thanks to our writer friend. Enjoy!

Thanks to Jon Allen who you can follow on Twitter @writerjonallen See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
